meanings.definition: Make changes in something established, especially by introducing new methods or ideas.
meanings.sent1: The company innovates its products to stay ahead in the market.
meanings.sent2: She constantly innovates her teaching methods to engage her students.
meanings.sent3: The chef decided to innovate the traditional recipe by adding a unique twist.
meanings.sent4: His innovative approach to problem-solving truly innovates the way we think.
meanings.sent5: The young entrepreneur's ability to innovates sets him apart from others in the industry.

meanings.definition: Introduce something new; make changes in anything established.
meanings.sent1: The tech company innovates new features in each software update.
meanings.sent2: He innovates his wardrobe by adding trendy pieces every season.
meanings.sent3: The magician decided to innovate his act by incorporating a new trick.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity truly innovates the fashion industry with fresh designs.
meanings.sent5: The artist's unique style of painting truly innovates the art world.
